A psalm written for people going up to the temple to worship
Yahweh, I look up toward you,
up to heaven, from where you rule.
and like maids ask t their mistresses
we ask you, Yahweh our God,
and we ask you to be merciful to us.
Yahweh, be very merciful [DOU] to us
have acted very contemptuously toward us.
Rich people have made fun of us for a long time,
who have ◄oppressed/acted cruelly toward► us have acted toward us as though we were worthless.
